name: Kharghira
entry: Khar'ghira is a half-dragon and skilled emissary who represents the Wyrmclaws, an influential dragon group. They handle the diplomatic and military matters of the order with fierce determination. Korgak, a barbarian who made an alliance with the Wyrmclaws, receives communication from Khar'ghira through a Sending Stone. They inform Korgak about his task to kidnap an Akanul diplomat. Korgak later becomes a branded member of the Wyrmclaws.
title: , Emissario Wyrmclaw

entity.name: Kharghira
entity.entry:
Khar'ghira: Emissary of the Wyrmclaws

Khar'ghira is a half-dragon and a highly capable emissary representing the Wyrmclaws, a powerful and influential dragon organization.

Wyrmclaw Responsibilities

The Wyrmclaws are responsible for managing the diplomatic and military affairs of their order. They approach these duties with unwavering determination and strength.

Communication with Korgak

Korgak, a barbarian who has forged an alliance with the Wyrmclaws, receives vital communications from Khar'ghira via a Sending Stone.

The Kidnapping Task

Through the Sending Stone, Khar'ghira informs Korgak of a specific mission: the kidnapping of an Akanul diplomat. This task highlights the nature of the Wyrmclaws' operations.

Korgak's Allegiance

Following his involvement with the Wyrmclaws, Korgak becomes a branded member, signifying his deeper commitment and integration into their ranks.
